FuncDef: The reset ifit flow-cache command clears IFIT flow table information on a device. The reset ifit flow-cache command clears IFIT flow table information on a device. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo: You can run this command to clear IFIT flow table information on a device.
